name: ABSTRACT WORLD PLATFORMER! by Supercube Games
name_original: ABSTRACT WORLD PLATFORMER! by Supercube Games
description:
Abstract World Platformer | Multiplayer!

Make Sure To ❤️ and ⭐️ this game & Follow Supercube_123 on Scratch! Play my other coolest games on: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Supercube_123 =D

How to play:

[Arrow Keys] to control your player!

[Collect] coins to purchase cool boosts in shop!

[Avoid]  enemies, spikes, lava and more!

[Purchase] tons of super boosts in shop to show off!

[Multiplayer] Play with your friends and chat online!

Check out my other games on https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Supercube_123 =)
